SourceProxy.name: VolumeDensityReader
SourceProxy.label: Blue Brain Experiment Reader for Volume Density Rendering.

Documentation.long_help: Read the BlueConfig file, create Experiment, BBP-SDK Pipeline and export a vtkImageData.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the experiment reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: Target
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the target name for the volume density visualization.
